title: December #ChopItUpSundays Brunch
desc: H ollywood's hottest and most exclusive monthly brunch series is here. Brought to you by Jaimi Alexander, of Just Jaimi Productions and Traci Goldstine, of TAG.Ur.It Events.  Chop It Up Sundays, is the premiere brunch event, for some of the dopest millenials in LA. Delicious food, phenomenal creators, desirable patio seating and Endless mimosas, set the scene for the perfect "Sunday Funday". If you're up for conscious conversation, meeting new incredible people and catching up with old friends, #ChopItUpSundays is the place to be! Our guests indulge in $15 limitless mimosas, $5 Bloody Mary's and delightful food!  #ChopItUpSundays brings a variety of guests such as artists, taste-makers, entertainment, finance, and business professionals. The vibes are great and everyone is ultra comfortable, feeling free to ChopItUp with friends old and new.  See you Sunday, December 13th! Follow us on Instagram and Twitter: @chopitupsundays **$5 Event/Service Fee will be applied** See the event:?https://youtu.be/XfUPmUPk0DU
